$AAPL  crash & burn baby!!! Biden’s China is on the verge of a market collapse and most proudly communist built Apple product factories are on full lockdown 😬😬😬

Woot woot…Q1 may be ok but buy your puts baby!! NFA! 😘

$AAPL Let’s do the math!!

In 2021 when the market was experiencing a massive bull run AAPL reported Q2 numbers of the following.

iPhone: 48 (up65%)
Mac: 9.1 (up70%)
iPad 7.8 (up79%)
Wearable: 7.9 (up24%)
Services: 17 (up26%)
Total : 89.6B  (up50%)

JPMorgan today predicted
iPhone : 45B (down 5%). They didn’t elaborate much on others but said total revenue growth will be moderate to flat.
Here’s my problem. At the time of their Q2 2021 earnings  AAPL was trading around $135 and trended down. We are talking 16% lower than todays value all during massive growth and a bull market.

How can we expect AAPL to continue trading at current values when growth (revenue) is slowing and maybe even decreasing. 

Bulls explain how you expect all time highs when just 12 months ago the market valued AAPL at 130ish with more revenue and explosive growth. 

I’m sorry I don’t see it. AAPL is headed much lower. Of course, this assumes JPMorgan is correct.

I’ll bet they are and maybe too generous.

$AAPL - JPMorgan slashing iPhone revenue. Add to this what we already knew which was iPhone SE, 12, 13 Mini sales were terrible, plus iPad supplier had issues in China on top of all the horrible economic data like very poor Consumer Sentiment. Apple's earnings are going to take a hit this year. Maaaaybe not this time, but we will definitely see Q2 of the economic downturn affect this big tech names. They got away with the bubble rally thanks to QE inflating their stock name. Plus with stimulus, people went buying useless landfill iPhones vs paying rent or bills. Those days are over. Now comes the reality check
